name: Roxy Raccoon's Bowling Bash
description:
Ten-Pin Bowling like you've never seen it before! A new foe has emerged and it is up to Roxy to stop her. Play as Roxy, an adventurous young cub as she rolls through this globe-trotting venture to save the world and prove, once and for all, that you are the true bowling champion!

Roxy Raccoon's Bowling Bash is the next adventure in the beloved Roxy franchise. Take on the mysterious Voodoo Priestess as you end her evil curse in this all new adventure! Experience 10-pin bowling where you are the ball, overcome the traps which lay ahead and strike out across alleys from around the globe!!



Classic 10 Pin Bowling action set across various landscapes.

Experience a unique flavor of Bowling where you are the ball and must overcome the lane hazards!

Shifting Alleys which keep changing to make sure no two rolls are ever the same!

All New Story which tells the next chapter in the Roxy Raccoon saga.

Online Achievements and Leaderboards to showcase your bowling expertise to the world!

Roll in style as you unlock colorful new cosmetics to customize Roxy’s appearance.

Watch the time and avoid the obstacles as you beat Priestess' score!
